narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Note: The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wishes to be a class "C" exhibitor.  The applicant will
mail a check for licensing fee to the Animal Care office in Raleigh, NC. 
Record keeping requirements were discussed during the time of inspection.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES ALLOWED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED. 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
